attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As winter approaches many of us are wondering just how on earth we will be able to afford to keep warm.  The elderly are at risk of freezing, effecting their health and wellbeing.  People on low incomes now have to choose between paying the bill and eating properly.
All this is happening while the utility companies are reporting unimaginable profits of billions. 
This is an injustice to the everyday person who needs their services not out of choice but necessity.
It is time for the government to take control of the utility companies. Do the decent thing and keep Britain warm.

government_responses.details:
